## Plot class

Basic drawing unit to which entities and behaviors can be attached.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Plot<TPlotRange, TRequiredTraits> implements IPlot<TPlotRange, TRequiredTraits> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [IPlot](./core.iplot.md)<!-- -->&lt;TPlotRange, TRequiredTraits&gt;
